oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Flooded Highway 70 South Mapco on the evening of May 3, 2010
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A photograph of flooding at the Mapco on Highway 70 South on the evening of Monday May 3, 2010.
Forms part of the Nashville Room Flood 2010 Digital History Project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville (Tenn.)--Floods; Nashville (Tenn.)--History--21st century; Bellevue (Tenn.); Harpeth River (Tenn.); Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ritter, Seth (Photographer)
